title: On Successful tender, user should see a blue notification appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the checkbox next to a preliminary addendum C
AND Clicks tender button on widget
custom_expected: THEN a blue success notification will appear on top of the page letting me know that my tender was successful

title: Verify the notification stays on screen until user hits X
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the checkbox next to a preliminary addendum C
AND Clicks tender button on widget
AND Blue Notification appears on screen
custom_expected: THEN Notification stays on screen until user hits the "x" button

title: Verify notification matches styling and color of wire and style guide
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the checkbox next to a preliminary addendum C
AND Clicks tender button on widget
custom_expected: THEN Notification appears with correct font and color based off wireframe

title: Verify the notification text is correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the checkbox next to a preliminary addendum C
AND Clicks tender button on widget
AND Blue Notification appears on screen
custom_expected: THEN The notification says "# of Addendum Cs were successfully tendered"

title: Verify that the Add C stays in the same location while scrolling through page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the checkbox next to a preliminary addendum C
AND Clicks tender button on widget
AND User scrolls through the addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN The addendum C should stay in the same location even after scrolling

title: Verify Wireframe
custom_preconds: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=no_errors
custom_steps:
Open up wireframe link
Cross check wireframe and ebis
custom_expected: Wireframe matches with ebis

title: Verify that GCL and AZL columns are removed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN user checks for AZL and GCL columns
custom_expected: THEN They should no longer exist and should be counted in the R column.

title: Verify that the columns of clubs follow Wireframe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into wireframe link
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_-_view_add_cs
custom_steps: WHEN User compares wireframe to ebis
custom_expected: THEN Ebis should look like wireframe.

title: Verify that "Years Left" column exists on the right of city signed column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User scrolls all the way to the right
custom_expected: THEN "Years Left" column exists on the right of city signed column

title: Verify When no rows are selected or filtered then show how many results are there total.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User looks at footer without selecting any checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN Footer shows how many total results are in widget

title: Verify When some rows are filtered but nothing is checked, then show how many rows are filtered. Ex. 34 results (filtered from 237)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks filter button
AND Types in a couple of letters
AND Clicks Apply
AND Looks at footer
custom_expected: THEN User should see how many results are in widget and the total filtered from.

title: Verify When rows are selected but none are filtered show as Ex. 3 of 237 selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects a few checkboxes
AND Looks at footer
custom_expected: THEN User see's how many addendum c's are selected

title: Verify When rows are selected and filtered show as Ex. 3 of 34 selected (filtered from 237)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects filter button
AND Types in a filter
AND Clicks Apply 
AND Selects a few checkboxes
AND Checks footer
custom_expected: THEN User will see how many addendum c's were selected from the filtered results (Will say Filtered from total results)

title: Verify User should be able to sort on the Date signed column in ascending or descending order
custom_preconds:
*Ascending is most recent to oldest and Descending is oldest to recent

GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks Date Signed Column 
AND Click Date Signed Column again
custom_expected:
THEN User gets Ascending order
AND THEN Gets Descending order

title: Verify Dates should be sorted chronologically and not alphabetically
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks date signed column
custom_expected: THEN Dates should be sorted by chronological order

title: Verify Where rows have the same date, there is no sorting needed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks column on two addendum c's with same signing date
custom_expected: THEN No sort occurs

title: Verify User should be able to enter cent values into any salary field on the Add C widget. This means entering a decimal point and up to 2 extra numbers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit pencil
AND Adds a decimal and 2 numbers
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C value should include the 2 decimal numbers added. (Cents)

title: Verify Any pre-existing salaries that already have cent values should display correctly - Salaries that don't have cent values should hide the ".00"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User adds .00 value to salaries
custom_expected:
THEN Hide .00 value
AND leave as a whole number
AND All pre-existing values should not show decimal values unless there is a value after the cent value. (Could be 1 or 2 values after the decimal.)

title: Verify Any sorting behavior should take into account cent values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User adds .99 and .98 cents to two different players at same level of play
AND Clicks the column
custom_expected: THEN Column of level of play should be sorted, .98 should be before .99 based on ascending or descending order.

title: Verify Limit user to entering one decimal point and 2 values following that
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit pencil
AND Adds a decimal point
custom_expected: THEN User only can type a max of 2 values after decimal.

title: Verify inputs should be wide enough to fit 00,000.00
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit
AND Adds a salary amount
custom_expected: THEN input should only be a max containing 00,000.00 width

title: The year of the listed Addendum Cs should appear as part of the widget title
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks title of addendum c widget
custom_expected: THEN Title should say (year) Addendum C's. [EX. 2016 Addendum C's]

title: Verify that any selected addendum c's values follow business rules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget

(19.2,19.7,19.9,19.10,19.11)
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects multiple preliminary addendum c checkboxes
AND leaves level of play empty
AND inputs a value higher than previous addendum c into all fields
AND Clicks tender
custom_expected: The addendum C should successfully tender

title: Verify if a business rule fails, the associated error message pops up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND user selects multiple preliminary addendum c checkboxes
custom_steps:
WHEN User leaves level of play empty
AND inputs 1 into all other fields
AND user clicks tender
custom_expected: THEN error modal should appear and reflect all failed business rules

title: Verify if all rules pass, Addendum C successfully tenders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a preliminary Add C
AND clicks 'Tender'
AND no business rules have failed
custom_expected: THEN Add C's status changes to tendered

title: Verify if any business rule fails, Addendum C does not successfully update
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND has selected Add Cs in preliminary state
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND one or more Add Cs violate business rules
custom_expected: Then the Add Cs status in not changed

title: Verify that the error pop up shows how many addendum C's passed and how many failed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has tendered more than one Add C in preliminary statues
custom_steps:
WHEN one or more of the Add Cs generates a hard error
AND one or more the Add Cs passes
AND an error pop-up is generated
custom_expected: THEN the error popup shows how many Add Cs passed and how many failed

title: Verify that the messages display in a table as shown in the wireframe with player id, Last name and Roster name, Current Add C status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has tendered more than one Add C in preliminary statues
custom_steps:
WHEN one or more of the Add Cs generates a hard error
AND an error pop-up is generated
custom_expected: THEN the error popup display is formatted in a table as per the wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors_returned

title: Verify there should be a separate table for each player/Addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has tendered more than one Add C in preliminary statues
custom_steps:
WHEN more than one of the Add Cs generates a hard error
AND an error pop-up is generated
custom_expected: THEN there should be a separate table within the error modal for each player that generated an error

title: Verify there is a close button that lets you dismiss the modal(error popup)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can see Addendum Cs widget
AND user has tendered one or more Add Cs in a preliminary state
custom_steps:
WHEN one or more Add Cs generate a hard error
AND the user clicks the 'Close' button on the error modal
custom_expected: THEN the error modal closes

title: Verify The modal must match the look and feel of the wireframe along with styling guidelines
custom_steps: Wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors_returned

title: Verify that zeroes must be treated the same as having left the field blank in regards to rule processing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can see the Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one or more Add Cs in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a 0 into any of the salary fields
AND user clicks 'Tender' button
custom_expected: THEN Add Cs are processed and rules are verified as if fields with 0s were left blank

title: Verify business rule 19.2
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND user selects an Add C in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN a salary is not entered in the Amount column for the Player's current level of play
AND user attempts to tender the Add C
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Verify business rule 19.7
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user creates a contract for a player
AND that player has already had a First Year International/Domestic contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters salaries for levels AAA,AA,A, SA, RA or R lower than in the first Addendum C of their first contract
AND the user clicks 'Tender'
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Verify Business Rule 19.9
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN users creates a First Year Domestic/International Contract
AND user enters a salary for ASL, DSL, or VSL that is less than $500
AND user clicks 'Tender'
custom_expected: Show hard error

title: Verify Business Rule 19.10
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND user can view Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a new contract for a player
AND that player already has a Non first year contract
AND the user enters a salary for ASL, DSL, or VSL lower than $500
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Verify business rule failure triggers associated errors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one Add C in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender' 
AND the C fails one or more business rules
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding errors are displayed

title: Veirfy error message shows how many failed, how many were successful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one Add C in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND the C fails one or more business rules
custom_expected: THEN the error modal displays how many (one) Add Cs failed and how many were succesfully tendered

title: Verify error modal has a close button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one Add C in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND the C fails one or more business rules
AND an error modal appears
custom_expected: THEN the error modal has a 'Close' button

title: Verify Users are able to export the data contained within a widget to a pdf file
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Gear Icon
AND clicks on Export to PDF
custom_expected:
THEN the loading icon should be shown while the PDF is being generated
AND the PDF should open in a new window in Adobe reader
AND include the title of the widget with the date run
AND the header is displayed in a contrasting color

title: Verify If the widget contains a table, the PDF output matches the columns and rows of the displayed widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on gear Icon
AND clicks on Export to PDF
custom_expected:
THEN the PDF file will be generated and compress the table as such that the table fits on a single page/landscape
AND the text in the table should wrap, and not ellipse
AND the PDF export matches the widget in the system (all rows are visible, all data is visible, nothing missing)

title: Verify If any filters are applied to the widget, these are also reflected in the export.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin
AND applies filters on the Add C widget (i.e. Filtering the widget to show only "Scranton Railriders")
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks gear Icon 
AND clicks on Export to PDF
custom_expected: THEN the generated PDF file will show filtered results (Only "Scranton Railriders" players)

title: Verify Users are able to export the data contained within a widget to a .xls or .xlsx file
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club admin
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Gear Icon
AND clicks Export to Excel
custom_expected:
THEN a loading icon is shown to the user while file is generated
AND an excel file is downloaded to users computer
AND the excel file includes ALL rows displayed on the widget (not just the ones loaded through pagination)
AND the export includes the title of the widget with the date run
AND the export includes contrasting colors on the headers with a black border

title: Verify  If any filters are applied to the widget, these are also reflected in the export.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks the filter button
AND Types in filter that would leave results
AND Clicks Apply
AND Clicks Gear
AND Clicks Export to excel
custom_expected: THEN Only filtered results should appear in excel

title: Verify The exported file should be properly formatted with column widths adjusted to display the data without any text wrapping or hiding
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND User has exported a file
custom_steps: WHEN User checks exported file
custom_expected: THEN All data should appear without text wrapping or being hidden and shown as displayed on Ebis

title: Verify that after closing the modal with hard errors and warnings, I should be able to see them on my widget with an icon as shown in the wireframe.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a preliminary addendum C
AND Enters 1 in every column
AND Clicks Tender
AND Clicks close on modal
custom_expected:
THEN User should see a red hard error icon and a warning icon for failed hard errors and warnings

* If there are no failed hard errors or warnings, the icon will not appear.

title: Verify that the icons should appear along side each player that triggered errors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a preliminary addendum C
AND Enters 1 in every column
AND Enters 3000 on one players addendum c for all values
AND Clicks Tender
AND Clicks close on modal
custom_expected:
THEN User should see a red hard error icon and a warning icon for failed hard errors and warnings while correct player should successfully tender

If there are no failed hard errors or warnings, the icon will not appear.

title: Verify that clicking the icon should show the associated messages.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into club account
AND User checks addendum C widget
AND User has already tried to tender a failed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks close on modal
AND Clicks on the error sign on the addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN Popup should appear telling user what errors occurred when trying to rule check the addendum C

title: Verify that the icon should show how many errors/warnings there are
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into club account
AND User checks addendum C widget
AND User has already tried to tender a failed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks close on modal
AND Checks the # on the red errors and yellow warnings
AND Clicks on the error sign on the addendum C widget
custom_expected: THEN The number of errors on the red and yellow error icons should match the number of errors/warnings there are

title: Verify that If there are no messages of a certain type, that icon and column should not show
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to tender one or multiple addendum Cs
AND there are no failed business rules
custom_expected:
THEN the addendum Cs will be successfully tendered
AND the additional columns for wanrings/blockers will not appear

title: Verify that the icons and associated columns will disappear on refreshing the widget or once the rule checks have been rerun, or once that Addendum C changes status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
WHEN user attempts to tender one or multiple ADD Cs
AND those Add Cs fail one or two business rules
custom_steps: WHEN user refreshes the widget
custom_expected: THEN the warnings/error icons should disappear

title: Business rule 19.11 must be run for salaries on all selected addendum Cs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one or more Add Cs in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND the salary for a particular level is cut by more than 20% of the most recent approved Add C salary for that level of play
custom_expected: THEN show soft warning

title: If this and all other business rules pass, the Add C must be successfully tendered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one or more Add Cs in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND the salary for a particular level is NOT cut by more than 20% of the most recent approved Add C salary for that level of play
AND all other business rules pass
custom_expected: THEN the status of the Add C is successfully updated to 'Tendered'

title: If it fails, then club is shown the error modal with the warning listed for each player that it failed for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected more than one Add C in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN the salary for a particular level of play is cut by more than 20% of the most recent approved Add C salary for that level of play
AND the above is true for more than one player
AND user clicks 'Tender'
custom_expected: THEN the resulting warning should have an entry for each player which failed the test

title: Zeroes must be treated the same as having left the field blank in regards to rule processing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one or more Add Cs in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND the C has a zero in one or more salary fields
custom_expected: THEN the zero cannot violate rule 19.11 and generate a warning

title: Once the Cs are tendered, then you see the blue success message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND can view Addendum Cs widget
AND user has selected one or more Add Cs in preliminary status
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'Tender'
AND all other business rules pass
custom_expected: THEN a blue success notification appears

title: Modal must match look and feel of wireframe
custom_steps: Wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=override

title: When a widget has error or warnings icons, each of those columns should be sortable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into club account
AND User checks addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox of preliminary addendum C's
AND Clicks Enter Salary
AND Enters 1
AND Clicks apply
AND Clicks tender
AND Closes modal
AND Clicks column of error
AND Clicks column of warnings
custom_expected: THEN Rows should sort with ascending or descending addendum c's with highest or lowest on top.

title: The first time the column title is clicked, the rows that had the icon come up to the top
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into club account
AND User checks addendum C widget
AND User has already tried to tender a failed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User Closes modal
AND Clicks column of error
AND Clicks column of warnings
custom_expected: THEN The row with the most errors/warnings appear on top

title: The warnings and hard errors can sort individually of each other
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User logs into club account
AND User checks addendum C widget
AND User has already tried to tender a failed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User Closes modal
AND Clicks column of error
AND Clicks column of warnings
custom_expected:
THEN When user selects error column, it should only sort based on highest number of errors 
AND If user selects warnings, it should sort based on highest number of warnings

title: If all errors are yellow warnings, club sees ignore and continue options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
custom_steps: WHEN one or more of the tendered Add Cs generates a warning by giving an addendum C a 20% paycut from their previous addendum C
custom_expected:
THEN club warning message
AND a Ignore and Continue button

title: If any one player has a red hard error, club cannot see ignore/continue option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND Set a row of addendum c's to 1
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
custom_steps:
WHEN one or more of the tendered Add. Cs raises a warning
AND at least one hard red error in modal
custom_expected: THEN club cannot see ignore and continue options

title: Clicking ignore/continue will allow Add C's to be successfully tendered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
AND one or more of the tendered Add Cs raises a warning
AND all of the warnings are yellow warnings
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Ignore and Continue" button
custom_expected: THEN the Add C(s) are succesfully tendered

title: If all business rules are met, the Add C's are successfully tendered then Club sees success message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
AND one or more of the tendered Add. Cs raises a warning
AND all of the warnings are yellow warnings
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Ignore and Continue" button
AND Add Cs are successfully tendered
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blue success message

title: Verify Modal Wireframe
custom_preconds: GIVEN Wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=override
custom_steps: WHEN User cross checks ebis and wireframe
custom_expected: THEN EBIS's modal should match wireframe

title: Verify that helper text updates as shown in wires if errors are overrideable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
AND one o more of the tendered Add. Cs raises a warning
AND all of the warnings are yellow warnings
custom_steps:
WHEN user has clicked "Ignore and Continue"
AND Add Cs are succesfully tendered
AND user hovers over a warning icon in the warning column
custom_expected: THEN helper text appears and is updated according to wireframe: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors_displayed_in_row

title: If Club chooses to go 'back', club is taken back to widget and no Add Cs are tendered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
AND has tendered one or more Add. Cs
AND one or more of the tendered Add. Cs raises a warning/error
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the 'Back' button
custom_expected:
THEN user is taken back to the widget
AND none of the Cs that had errors/warnings of either type are tendered
